Description: Category of metadata; provide the same one for all items/rows.
Defined format of the data file, typically corresponding to extension, but sometimes indicating more general group of files produced by the same tool or software
Valid Values: fastq, bam, csv, xlsx, txt, pdf, tsv, .h5, tar.gz, .h5ad

Description: The technology used to generate the data.
Valid Values: scRNASeq, RNASeq, WES, WGS, LC-MS/MS, CyTOF

Description: The type of resource being stored and annotated
Label assigned to experimental data files indicating whether the data contained corresponds to a single or multiple biospecimens
The processing level of the data.
High-level classification of the type of data contained in the file, loosely related to the experimental method or biological entity that is being profiled.
Valid Values: transcriptomics, proteomics, genomics, metabolomics, lipidomics, microbiome, cytometry, functional study

Description: This attribute labels files according to the Cell Ranger output folder from which they were derived.
The synID biospecimen metadata file containing information about the samples profiled
The synID scRNA-seq assay metadata file corresponding to this data file.
